jurisdictions.name: Wyoming, United States
jurisdictions.summary: U.S. pioneer in digital asset statutes with DAO LLC recognition and SPDI-aligned banking pathways.

frameworks.name: Wyoming Limited Liability Company (LLC)
frameworks.description: Flexible LLC form with digital asset special-purpose provisions under Wyoming Statutes Title 17.
digital_capabilities: Digital asset custody designation as special purpose depository
statutes: Wyo. Stat. §17-29 (Wyoming Limited Liability Company Act)
Wyo. Stat. §17-12-101 et seq. (Digital Asset Custody)

frameworks.name: Wyoming Nonprofit Corporation
frameworks.description: Nonstock corporation governed by the Wyoming Nonprofit Corporation Act with accommodation for mission-driven token projects.
digital_capabilities: Operating grant-making DAOs with charitable compliance

frameworks.name: Wyoming DAO LLC
frameworks.description: First-in-US legal wrapper for decentralized autonomous organizations, enabling smart-contract governed LLCs.
statutes: Wyo. Stat. §17-31-101 et seq. (Wyoming Decentralized Autonomous Organization Supplement)

jurisdictions.name: Delaware, United States
jurisdictions.summary: Contractually flexible jurisdiction favored by venture-backed digital projects and public-benefit DAOs.
primary_regulators: Delaware Department of Justice Investor Protection Unit

frameworks.name: Delaware Limited Liability Company
frameworks.description: Gold-standard LLC for venture-backed digital platforms with contractual flexibility for token governance.
digital_capabilities: Series LLC structures for protocol ventures
statutes: 6 Del. C. §18 (Delaware Limited Liability Company Act)

frameworks.name: Delaware Nonstock Corporation
frameworks.description: 501(c)(3)/(c)(4)-ready wrapper for open-source and public-goods DAOs seeking US nonprofit status.
statutes: 8 Del. C. §101 et seq. (Delaware General Corporation Law)

frameworks.name: Delaware LLC with DAO Operating Agreement
frameworks.description: Private-ordering DAO wrapper leveraging LLC contractual freedom to embed smart-contract governance.
statutes: Uniform Electronic Transactions Act (6 Del. C. §12A)

jurisdictions.name: Zug, Switzerland
jurisdictions.summary: Crypto Valley canton with mature guidance on tokenized equity, foundations, and association models.
primary_regulators: Commercial Register of the Canton of Zug

frameworks.name: Gesellschaft mit beschränkter Haftung (GmbH)
frameworks.description: Swiss GmbH with Crypto Valley precedents for tokenized equity and asset issuance.
digital_capabilities: Crypto custody licensing under FINMA guidelines

frameworks.name: Swiss Association
frameworks.description: Flexible membership association widely used for protocol stewardship and decentralized networks.
digital_capabilities: Foundation-style treasury management without share capital

frameworks.name: Swiss Foundation (Stiftung) for Protocol Governance
frameworks.description: Foundation structure tailored to oversee protocol IP and grant-making with strong regulatory recognition.
digital_capabilities: Regulated token issuance under FINMA guidance

jurisdictions.name: Singapore
jurisdictions.summary: Highly regulated fintech hub with clear licensing regimes for digital payment tokens and fund vehicles.

frameworks.name: Private Company Limited by Shares (Pte. Ltd.)
frameworks.description: Default vehicle for venture-backed Web3 companies with streamlined fintech licensing pathways.
digital_capabilities: Payment Services Act licensing for digital payment token services

frameworks.name: Company Limited by Guarantee (CLG)
frameworks.description: Nonprofit entity favored for open-source projects and foundation-style governance supporting token ecosystems.

frameworks.name: Singapore Variable Capital Company (VCC) for Tokenized Funds
frameworks.description: Investment fund wrapper enabling tokenized sub-funds and on-chain asset management with regulatory clarity.

jurisdictions.name: Estonia
jurisdictions.summary: Digital-first EU member with e-residency, remote company formation, and VASP supervision.
primary_regulators: Estonian Centre of Registers and Information Systems
Estonian Financial Supervision and Resolution Authority

frameworks.name: Private Limited Company (Osaühing / OÜ)
frameworks.description: E-residency friendly corporate form enabling fully digital management and crypto licensing.
statutes: Money Laundering and Terrorist Financing Prevention Act

frameworks.name: Nonprofit Association (MTÜ)
frameworks.description: Community-first vehicle for digital public goods and DAO stewardship with transparent governance requirements.

frameworks.name: Estonian OÜ with DAO Bylaws
frameworks.description: Hybrid wrapper recognized by Estonian regulators allowing smart-contract governance encoded into articles.
digital_capabilities: On-chain voting recognized via digital signatures

jurisdictions.name: Abu Dhabi Global Market (United Arab Emirates)
jurisdictions.summary: English-law aligned free zone offering virtual asset sandboxes, foundations, and DAO-specific regulations.

frameworks.name: ADGM Private Company Limited by Shares
frameworks.description: Modern corporate form tailored for fintech and virtual asset ventures with English-law alignment.
digital_capabilities: Regulatory sandbox access for digital asset services

frameworks.name: ADGM Foundation
frameworks.description: Foundation structure supporting protocol treasuries, philanthropic grants, and ecosystem governance.

frameworks.name: ADGM DLT Foundation (DAO Framework)
frameworks.description: 2023 regulations enabling DAO-style governance with recognized token-holder rights and smart contract references.
statutes: ADGM Distributed Ledger Technology Foundations Regulations 2023
